title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 185.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 185.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following terms have the
following meanings: (a) Department
means the Department of Environmental Conservation. (b) License issuing officers means

Environmental Conservation Officers, other authorized employees of the
department, clerks of a county, town or city, and other persons appointed by
the commissioner of the department as authorized by section
11-0713
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. (c) Migratory
bird products means stamps, prints, posters, pins, note cards, and other
products containing the migratory bird print images produced by or for the
department as part of the migratory bird stamp program authorized by section
11-0307
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. (d) Issue year
means the calendar year in which a particular design of migratory bird stamps
is first issued for sale to the public. (e) Doubled barred stamps means migratory
bird stamps on which two black lines are printed through the price of the
stamp. (f) Mint stamps means
individual stamps that are uncancelled with the original gum on the back, and
are in the same condition as new. (g) Full sheet means a complete page of mint
stamps with five stamps across and six stamps down with the original gum on the
back and printing plate number or numbers in the margin of all four corners of
the page. (h) Plate block means a
block of four mint stamps with two stamps across and two stamps down taken from
a corner of a full sheet with the printing plate number or numbers in the
margin. (i) Artist signed stamps
means mint stamps, whether individual, plate block or full sheet, bearing on
each stamp the signature of the artist who designed the stamps. Such signature
shall be hand written by the artist and not printed or placed on the stamps by
other mechanical means. (j) Regular
edition means a series of artist-signed and numbered prints. (k) Medallion edition means a series of
artist-signed and numbered prints, each of which include a specially minted
medallion. (l) Executive edition
means a series of artist-signed and numbered prints, each of which include a
specially minted medallion and an original artist color remarque. (m) Conservation edition means a series of
artist-signed and numbered prints, produced for the specific purpose of
promoting the migratory bird program and the sale of prints and
stamps. (n) Artist proof means a
series of prints that are retained by the artist for his or her personal
use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
185.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
